attributes.action: Investigate the increasing reports from cyclists and motorcylists that the roads have become dangerously slippy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For the last few years there has been increasing anecdotal reports from cyclists and motorcyclists that the roads have become more slippy each winter.

The frequency of reports appear to increase if frost is forecast and the roads are gritted, but there is then no significant snow/rainfall for a period.

An investigation should be carried out to ensure that the anecdotal reports do not reflect an increased danger to two or four wheel users of the roads.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
